note.p: Merchant marine. Son of Theodore Grant Cresy. Indentured in the merchant navy, 1879. Died in South Africa.
Registry of shipping and seamen: index of apprentices (The National Archives: Public Record Office BT 150: 13)
Transvaal Province, South Africa, estates death notice index, 1855–1976 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2020)
